001
002import java.io.BufferedReader;
003import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
004import java.io.FileInputStream;
005import java.io.InputStreamReader;
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.util.Collections;
008import java.util.Comparator;
009import java.util.List;
010
011/**
012 * sample http applet
013 *
014 * @author matecsaba
015 */
016public class phoneBook implements Comparator<String> {
017
018    /**
019     * this is needed for cli startup
020     *
021     * @param args command line parameters
022     */
023    public static void main(String[] args) {
024        phoneBook app = new phoneBook();
025        String a;
026        try {
027            ByteArrayOutputStream buf = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
028            a = "" + app.getClass();
029            a = app.httpRequest("http://localhost/" + a, "./" + a, "cli",
030                    "clibrowser", "user", args, buf);
031            a = "type=" + a + "\r\ndata:\r\n" + buf;
032        } catch (Exception e) {
033            a = "exception " + e.getMessage();
034        }
035        System.out.println(a);
036    }
037
038    public int compare(String o1, String o2) {
039        return o1.toLowerCase().compareTo(o2.toLowerCase());
040    }
041
042    /**
043     * do one request
044     *
045     * @param url url of app
046     * @param path path of app
047     * @param peer client address
048     * @param agent user agent
049     * @param user auth data
050     * @param par parameters
051     * @param buf result buffer, if empty, pathname must present
052     * @return [pathname"][file name.]extension
053     * @throws Exception if something went wrong
054     */
055    public String httpRequest(String url, String path, String peer,
056            String agent, String user, String[] par, ByteArrayOutputStream buf)
057            throws Exception {
058        String name = null;
059        for (int o = 0; o < par.length; o++) {
060            String a = par[o];
061            int i = a.indexOf("=");
062            if (i < 0) {
063                break;
064            }
065            String s = a.substring(i + 1, a.length()).trim();
066            a = a.substring(0, i).trim();
067            if (a.equals("name")) {
068                name = s;
069                continue;
070            }
071        }
072        if (name == null) {
073            buf.write("<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>".getBytes());
074            buf.write("<CiscoIPPhoneInput>".getBytes());
075            buf.write("<Title>phonebook search</Title>".getBytes());
076            buf.write("<Prompt>enter name</Prompt>".getBytes());
077            buf.write(("<URL>" + url + "</URL>").getBytes());
078            buf.write("<InputItem><DisplayName>name</DisplayName><QueryStringParam>name</QueryStringParam><InputFlags>A</InputFlags><DefaultValue/></InputItem>".getBytes());
079            buf.write("</CiscoIPPhoneInput>".getBytes());
080            return "xml";
081        }
082        name = name.toLowerCase();
083        int i = path.lastIndexOf(".");
084        path = path.substring(0, i) + ".csv";
085        List<String> res = new ArrayList<String>();
086        try {
087            FileInputStream in = new FileInputStream(path);
088            BufferedReader rd = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(in));
089            while (rd.ready()) {
090                String a = rd.readLine();
091                if (a.indexOf(name) < 0) {
092                    continue;
093                }
094                i = a.lastIndexOf(",");
095                if (i < 0) {
096                    continue;
097                }
098                String s = a.substring(i + 1, a.length()).replaceAll(" ", "").replaceAll("\\(", "").replaceAll("\\)", "").trim();
099                a = a.substring(0, i).trim();
100                res.add("<DirectoryEntry><Name>" + a + "</Name><Telephone>" + s + "</Telephone></DirectoryEntry>");
101            }
102            rd.close();
103            Collections.sort(res, new phoneBook());
104        } catch (Exception e) {
105            return null;
106        }
107        buf.write("<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>".getBytes());
108        buf.write("<CiscoIPPhoneDirectory>".getBytes());
109        buf.write("<Title>phonebook search</Title>".getBytes());
110        buf.write("<Prompt>select person</Prompt>".getBytes());
111        for (i = 0; i < res.size(); i++) {
112            buf.write(res.get(i).getBytes());
113        }
114        buf.write("</CiscoIPPhoneDirectory>".getBytes());
115        return "xml";
116    }
117
118}
